name: DYNAMICA 23
description:
Introducing DYNAMICA 23, a clearly comparable game to DYNAMICA 22.
DYNAMICA 23 is a 2D two-player football game.
---------------------------------------------------
DYNAMICA 23 contains better colored objects, fixed scripts and scoring, better UI, etc.
---CONTROLS---
W A S D  - Player 1 / Red
Arrows   - Player 2 / Blue
---------------------------------------------------
You can play DYNAMICA 23 on Windows and Linux. (32-bit Linux computers cannot run DYNAMICA)
---------------------------------------------------
DYNAMICA is a project we thinked about for quite a few months (Before DYNAMICA 22's release). We decided to make this game with inspiration from Croteam's 1994 Football Glory for MS-DOS.
---LEAK FOR DYNAMICA 24---
DYNAMICA 24 will be a new-gen game, containing different types of gamemodes, better UI, etc.
